raw_comment: I notice that there are a lot more players of color than coaches overall, and I wonder why there are the least amount of colored people in major league baseball. This impacts me and my community by showing the amount of representation colored people get in different sports.
ace_sentences: I notice that there are more players of color than coaches overall.
I wonder why there are the fewest people of color in Major League Baseball.
This situation shows the amount of representation that people of color get in different sports.
